Detailed Description

Traits struct defines types for queue implementations.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef void cds::queue::traits::node_deleter_functor

Node deletion function.

This functor is used internally for some implementations of queue. If a queue may store the nodes of different types then for those queue the node deletion function must be provided.

If it is void then use default GC-related node deletion function
